about_the_game:
Falling Rain is a third-person anime shooting RPG with advanced movement mechanics. Immerse yourself in a post-apocalyptic world, experience the characters' struggles, and follow them to the end of their stories.

Players can control various characters, experience their stories, and form emotional connections with them. Build relationships with specific NPCs, search for resources to prolong their lives, grow stronger, and save the world before the end of humanity.

Character With Personal Struggle

You can play as various characters, each with distinctive concepts and battle styles.

Cinematic Gameplay Experiences

Fully immerse yourself in the character and experience the moment.

NPC Helping Hand

You can build relationships with specific NPCs and get to know their personal stories and struggles.
You can even summon these NPCs to help you in combat.

Advance Wall Run

Advanced wall running that will change your perspective of the world.

PvP Content

We plan to add various PvP content, such as leaderboards, team deathmatch, and more.

More Than Just A Game

This game is developed by a solo dev with the help of friends and strangers. He wishes to create something more than just a game. His aim is to turn this game into a cultural IP and build a community around it.

So, join the ride! Connect with him and his friends on Discord, and follow for more exciting updates.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window 10 or above
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.5 GHz / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1050 / AMD RX550
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
